price: 11. Seehadayti tuk teyna yanqibe waqdi isi nafsii kee isi ahali abaara iggimaa kee Qataatakoh, isi nafsii kee isi ahlih isi Rabbi kayri kah esserannah, seehadayti usuk qaxbaxxaago li kinni.
arabic: وَيَدۡعُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ بِٱلشَّرِّ دُعَآءَهُۥ بِٱلۡخَيۡرِۖ وَكَانَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ عَجُولٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wayadʿu al-insānu bil-shari duʿāahu bil-khayri wakāna al-insānu ʿajūlan
